The following properties hold if A ∈Rn×n is symmetric and positive

The null space (kernel) of Aconsists only of 0 because x⊤Ax>0 for
all x̸= 0. This implies that Ax̸= 0 if x̸= 0.
The diagonal elements aii of Aare positive because aii = e⊤
